name: PM-Kisan Samman Nidhi
eligibility: Farmers with up to 2 hectares of land.
documents: Aadhaar card, land ownership papers, bank details.
how_to_apply: Apply through PM-Kisan portal or CSC center.

name: Pradhan Mantri Kisan Samman Nidhi (PM-KISAN)
eligibility: All landholding farmer families with cultivable land, subject to certain exclusion criteria.
documents: Aadhaar card, land ownership documents, bank account details.
how_to_apply: Register online at the PM-KISAN portal or through local revenue officials or CSCs.

name: Kisan Credit Card (KCC) Scheme
keywords: im a farmer i need loan
eligibility: All farmers including tenant farmers, sharecroppers, and self-help groups involved in agriculture and allied activities.
documents: Identity proof, land documents, bank account details, passport-size photo.
how_to_apply: Apply through banks or cooperative societies; forms also available online.

name: Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana (PMFBY)
eligibility: All farmers growing notified crops in notified areas, including loanee and non-loanee farmers.
documents: Aadhaar, land records, sowing certificate, bank account details.
how_to_apply: Apply through banks, CSCs, or the PMFBY portal before the cut-off date for each season.

name: Widow Pension Scheme
keywords: im a widow i need pension
eligibility: Women who are widows and below the poverty line.
documents: Death certificate of husband, Aadhaar, income proof.
how_to_apply: Apply at local district office or online on state portal.

name: Ayushman Bharat - PM-JAY
eligibility: Poor and vulnerable families as per SECC 2011 data.
documents: Aadhaar card, ration card or eligibility ID.
how_to_apply: Check eligibility and apply on the PM-JAY website or visit Ayushman Mitra.

name: Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana (PMAY)
keywords: im a tenant i need house
eligibility: Urban or rural poor with no pakka house in family name.
documents: Aadhaar, income certificate, residence proof.
how_to_apply: Apply online via PMAY portal or through CSC centers.

name: Ujjwala Yojana
eligibility: Women from BPL families without LPG connection.
documents: Aadhaar, ration card, bank account details.
how_to_apply: Apply through LPG distributor or online.

name: Pradhan Mantri Jan Dhan Yojana
eligibility: Any Indian citizen above 10 years of age.
documents: Aadhaar, identity proof, address proof.
how_to_apply: Visit nearest bank with documents to open account.

name: National Scholarship Portal
eligibility: Students from SC/ST/OBC/Minority/EWS backgrounds.
documents: Income certificate, caste certificate, Aadhaar, education records.
how_to_apply: Apply online through the NSP website.

name: Pragati Scholarship Scheme
eligibility: Girl students admitted to AICTE-approved institutions with family income less than ₹8 lakh/annum.
documents: Income certificate, Aadhaar, admission proof, bank details, academic records.
how_to_apply: Apply online through the AICTE scholarship portal.

name: Vidya Lakshmi Education Loan Scheme
eligibility: Indian students pursuing higher education in India or abroad; must be registered on the portal.
documents: Loan application form, income proof, Aadhaar, admission letter, academic records.
how_to_apply: Apply through the Vidya Lakshmi portal for multiple bank loan options.

name: National Means-cum-Merit Scholarship Scheme (NMMSS)
keywords: i am a student i need scholarship
eligibility: Students with annual family income below ₹3.5 lakh and at least 55% marks in Class 8.
documents: Income certificate, Aadhaar, academic records, NMMSS exam certificate.
how_to_apply: Apply online through the National Scholarship Portal (NSP).

name: PM Kaushal Vikas Yojana (PMKVY)
eligibility: Youth (18–35) seeking skill-based employment.
documents: Aadhaar, identity proof, education qualification.
how_to_apply: Register on Skill India portal and join nearest center.

name: Pradhan Mantri Mudra Yojana (PMMY)
eligibility: Non-corporate small business segments including proprietors, artisans, shopkeepers, and service sector workers.
documents: Aadhaar, business proof, bank account details, application form.
how_to_apply: Apply through any bank, NBFC, or online via the Mudra portal.

name: PM Vishwakarma Yojana
eligibility: Traditional artisans and craftspeople from 18 trades such as carpenter, blacksmith, potter, etc.
documents: Aadhaar, caste certificate (if applicable), skill proof, bank details.
how_to_apply: Apply online via the PM Vishwakarma portal or through CSCs.

name: PM eVIDYA
eligibility: Students and teachers across India seeking digital education resources.
documents: No specific documents required for access; internet-enabled device recommended.
how_to_apply: Access through the DIKSHA portal, Swayam platform, or PM eVIDYA TV channels.

name: e-Shram Portal
eligibility: Unorganised sector workers aged 16–59 years, including gig and platform workers.
documents: Aadhaar, mobile number linked with Aadhaar, bank account details.
how_to_apply: Register online at the e-Shram portal or visit a Common Service Centre (CSC).

name: Employees' State Insurance Scheme (ESIC)
eligibility: Employees earning ₹21,000/month or less in establishments registered under the ESI Act.
documents: Aadhaar, employer registration, salary proof, bank details.
how_to_apply: Employers register eligible workers through the ESIC portal.

name: Pradhan Mantri Shram Yogi Maandhan (PM-SYM)
eligibility: Unorganised workers aged 18–40 years with monthly income up to ₹15,000.
documents: Aadhaar, savings bank account, mobile number.
how_to_apply: Enroll through CSCs or online via the Maandhan portal.

name: Ayushman Bharat Pradhan Mantri Jan Arogya Yojana (PM-JAY)
eligibility: Families identified under the SECC 2011 data and those in the occupational category of urban workers.
documents: Aadhaar, ration card, income certificate (if applicable).
how_to_apply: Check eligibility and apply through the Ayushman Bharat portal or visit an empaneled hospital.

name: National Health Mission (NHM)
eligibility: All Indian citizens, with a focus on rural and underserved populations.
documents: No specific documents required for general services; ID proof for specific programs.
how_to_apply: Access services through government health centers and mobile health units.

name: Pradhan Mantri Matru Vandana Yojana (PMMVY)
eligibility: Pregnant and lactating women for the first two live births, including unmarried adolescents aged 18+ (as of 2025).
documents: Aadhaar, pregnancy proof, bank account details.
how_to_apply: Apply through Anganwadi centers or online via the PMMVY portal.

name: Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana – Gramin (PMAY-G)
eligibility: Rural households without a pucca house, identified through SECC 2011 data.
documents: Aadhaar, job card (MGNREGA), bank account details, income certificate.
how_to_apply: Apply through the Gram Panchayat or online via the PMAY-G portal.

name: Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana – Urban (PMAY-U)
eligibility: Urban poor including EWS, LIG, and MIG households without a pucca house.
documents: Aadhaar, income proof, property documents, bank account details.
how_to_apply: Apply online via the PMAY-U portal or through urban local bodies.

name: Basava Vasati Yojana (Karnataka)
eligibility: Residents of Karnataka from economically weaker sections without permanent housing.
documents: Aadhaar, income certificate, domicile proof, bank details.
how_to_apply: Apply through the Rajiv Gandhi Housing Corporation Limited (RGHCL) portal.

name: Gruha Lakshmi Scheme
eligibility: Women heads of BPL families in Telangana without a permanent house.
documents: Aadhaar, ration card, income certificate, bank account details.
how_to_apply: Apply through the official Telangana housing portal or local municipal offices.

name: National Food Security Act (NFSA)
eligibility: Up to 75% of rural and 50% of urban population, including Priority Households and Antyodaya Anna Yojana (AAY) families.
documents: Ration card, Aadhaar, income certificate (if applicable).
how_to_apply: Apply through the local Public Distribution System (PDS) office or state food department.

name: Pradhan Mantri Garib Kalyan Anna Yojana (PMGKAY)
eligibility: NFSA beneficiaries including AAY and Priority Households.
documents: Ration card, Aadhaar.
how_to_apply: No separate application needed; food grains distributed through PDS to eligible families.

name: PM POSHAN (formerly Mid-Day Meal Scheme)
eligibility: Children studying in government and government-aided schools from Class 1 to 8.
documents: School enrollment records.
how_to_apply: Automatically provided through schools; no separate application required.

name: ADIP Scheme (Assistance to Disabled Persons for Purchase/Fitting of Aids and Appliances)
eligibility: Indian citizens with 40% or more disability and a monthly income below ₹30,000.
documents: Disability certificate, income proof, Aadhaar card, passport-size photo.
how_to_apply: Apply through empanelled NGOs or ALIMCO centers. Camps are also organized for distribution.

name: NIRAMAYA Health Insurance Scheme
eligibility: Persons with Autism, Cerebral Palsy, Mental Retardation, or Multiple Disabilities registered under the National Trust Act.
documents: Disability certificate, proof of registration with National Trust, ID proof.
how_to_apply: Apply online through the National Trust portal or via registered organizations.

name: GHARAUNDA (Group Home for Adults)
eligibility: Adults (18+) with Autism, Cerebral Palsy, Mental Retardation, or Multiple Disabilities.
documents: Disability certificate, age proof, ID proof, guardian details.
how_to_apply: Apply through GHARAUNDA centers or online via the National Trust website.
